mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. Morgan Securities PLC
mailBody:
Dear Client,

I hope this message finds you well.

I wanted to inform you that the checklist for J.P. Morgan Securities PLC has been updated successfully. The "Company PEP Screening" has been marked as validated based on the analyzed data. However, please note that the status for "Company Directorship" and other pending items remains as "Pending" or "Missing," as we could not extract any supplementary data regarding these topics.

If you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Surbhi Nagori
